input.command:
cd /home/user/project && npm run dev &
NEXT_PID=$!
sleep 5
curl -X POST "http://localhost:3000/api/translate" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "operation": "translate",
    "text": "Hello world",
    "sourceLang": "en",
    "targetLang": "es"
  }'
sleep 2
kill $NEXT_PID 2>/dev/null || true
